pages.text: $(o)$(item)End Crystals$(0) are rather enigmatic devices. I've found myself fascinated by them, to be candid. $(p)They serve no practical use, besides their explosive nature, but they are made of such potent reagents it seems insane that they would do nothing at all.

$(o)Research Update: I've found evidence of $(4)two distinct reactions$(0) that can be induced by having an End Crystal near your Crucible. $(br2)The safety implications of working with such volatile devices aside, I believe it is worth your attention.
